name: Raspicade
short_description:
A distribution full configured for retrogaming on Raspberry (256, 512B, 512B+, A, A+, new Pi2 supported). 

Based on Moebius Linux

Uses 5 emulators optimized for Raspberry Pi : Mame4all-pi, piFBA, GnGeo, pi-SNES9x, Dgen and Picodrive. 

Uses libretro for NES (fceu), GB/GBC (gambatte), GBA (meteor), PlayStation 1 (PSX), Atari2600 (stella), Vectrex (vecx) emulators.

Selectable frontend : ES2, ES1 and Pimenu. 

Fully supports the XinMo 2 players arcade module. 

Fully supporting keyboard/keyboard encoder (IPAC, Kade http://kadevice.com/ or pikeydx32 http://atmjoy.com/pikeyd-pi-gpio-keyboard-daemon-i2c-mcp3017/ with pikeyd daemon). 

Last B+ GPIO is supported too (see wiki for details). Keys are the same for all emulators and are based on the Mame default key mapping.

Raspicade users, please, leave a review and post links of your cab pictures in the discussion page.

If you like the project, consider Donate on the wiki page https://sourceforge.net/p/raspicade/wiki/HowT
summary: Raspicade : Yet Another Arcade Distribution for Raspberry Pi
